attributes.action: make a public statement to reassure the western christian population of this country that despite the acceptance of the many and varied activities of the growing Muslim population, beheading as a method of causing the death of a non-Muslim (as required by the Koran) will never be accepted by Nu-Labour as a legitimate religious activity and therefore outside the scope of british courts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We will get there!  And I want to be on the record as the first person to state, publicly, that I am concerned that we are getting there.
